summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of 45th Avenue Southwest, from West Hinds Street to West Charlestown Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by constructing sewers, all in accordance with Resolution No. 7972 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment of said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by mode of "Payment by Bonds".
